SnapBundle Model 2.7 API


SnapBundle™ is a platform purposefully built to be an application's contextual data store, and if you are developing a solution that is either not Java based or you'd simply prefer to operate using standard JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and REST web service calls, please refer to the public REST endpoint documentation at http://docs.snapbundle.apiary.io.

See: Description

Model 
Package Description
com.snapbundle.builder
Collection of entity builder objects used to quickly and efficiently assemble a complete entity definition.
com.snapbundle.model.base
Foundational interfaces from which the entire SnapBundle object model is derived.
com.snapbundle.model.context
Collection of SnapBundle context modeling artifacts.
com.snapbundle.pojo.base
Abstract objects from which the platform's object model is constructed.
com.snapbundle.pojo.context
Collection of POJOs that represent the platform's object model.
GeoJSON Support 
Package Description
com.snapbundle.geo
Convenience collection of GeoJSON POJOs used for serializing and deserializing to and from JSON, respectively.
com.snapbundle.model.geo
Geospatial entity definition.
com.snapbundle.pojo.geo
Geospatial POJO.
Integration 
Package Description
com.snapbundle.model.event
Core event definitions that facilitate near real-time integration with external components authorized via OAuth 2.0, whereby the events are delivered to an INotificationEndpoint.
com.snapbundle.model.integration
Provides integration mechanism with external systems via HTTP/S POST.
com.snapbundle.pojo.event
Event definition primarily used for capturing user activity and for convey near real-time state modifications within a given account context to 3rd party integrators (e.g.
com.snapbundle.pojo.integration
Integration endpoint definitions.
Extensions 
Package Description
com.snapbundle.model.extension
Defines a plugin metaphor whereby 3rd party developers can tap into an account's contextual data in order to perform advanced computations that are not natively supported by the SnapBundle platform.
com.snapbundle.pojo.extension
POJOs used for defining an extension (a.k.a plugin).
Utilities 
Package Description
com.snapbundle
Constant values, eg Field.
com.snapbundle.util
Collection of platform wide helper classes.
com.snapbundle.util.json
JSON specific helper utilities.
com.snapbundle.util.mapper
Collection of type-safe metadata de-/serializers that transform strongly typed values into a proprietary byte-array structure for type-safe storage and representation even across JSON.

SnapBundle™ is a platform purposefully built to be an application's contextual data store, and if you are developing a solution that is either not Java based or you'd simply prefer to operate using standard JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and REST web service calls, please refer to the public REST endpoint documentation at http://docs.snapbundle.apiary.io.
